alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 8:18AM MST until December 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Less than a tenth of an inch of ice expected. Little or no snow accumulation. * WHERE...Harney County and Malheur County in southeast Oregon. The Lower Treasure Valley in southeast Oregon and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially for the morning commute. Sidewalks may be ice-covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures in the low elevations will gradually rise above freezing throughout the early morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River
